desc: You wasted a whole day rhyming "orange" and "orange"
You used your day to learn new words
You noticed you used a lot of Jojo references. You removed some of them
You don't understand how, but Minion's film gave you ideas for the text
You watched a lot of gangsta movies for inspiration
Some of lines are off-beat, but it makes it better
You decided your text is bad, and you took a day rewriting
You messed up with the conjugation, and decided to take more time for the text
You messed up with the conjugation, but you let it go because it can make it look like an experiment
You lost a day watching Peppa Pig
